subtitleNullable: Letters from various fonts in MNIST format
descriptionNullable:
Simple dataset containing 28x28 images of letters in different fonts. 

Each row consists of 784 pixel columns and 1 label column. Pixels are numbered from left to right, then top to bottom. 
Images have only one channel. There are 26 labels (one for every letter in English alphabet). Each label is balanced (has exact same number of samples)

Second file (digital-letters-alt) contains less ,,artistic" fonts, but has fewer rows

Fonts were obtained from Google Fonts
